titles.title: Alternative Data for Additional Credit FHA Pilot Program Reauthorization Act
FHA Additional Credit Pilot Program Reauthorization Act
Alternative Data for Additional Credit FHA Pilot Program Reauthorization Act

To authorize a pilot program under section 258 of the National Housing Act to establish an automated process for providing additional credit rating information for mortgagors and prospective mortgagors under certain mortgages.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 32 - 22.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 116-663.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 547.

bill.summary:
FHA Alternative Credit Pilot Program Reauthorization Act
This bill reauthorizes a pilot program for an alternative credit rating system for use by mortgage lenders. Specifically, the program provides credit information about borrowers who have insufficient credit histories for purposes of determining their creditworthiness for mortgages insured by the Federal Housing Administration.
